_meanings:
{@--1@} To
sit, sit down, recline, lie, lie down,
rest, settle; {#amadAH sedurekasmin#} 
{#nitaMbe niKilA gireH#} <ls>Bk. 7. 58.</ls>

{@--4@} To be dejected or low-spirited,
despond, despair, sink into 
despondency; {#nATa hare jaya nATa hare#}
{#sIdati rADA vAsagfhe#} <ls>GÄ«t. 6.</ls>

{@--8@} To
be languid, be wearied or fatigued,
droop, sink; {#sIdati me hfdayaM#} <ls>K.</ls>;
{#sIdaMti mama gAtrARi#} <ls>Bg. 1. 28.</ls>

{@--1@} To cause
to sit down, rest.

{@--2@} To throw or
cast down, place, put.
